trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> class represents a set of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> 類別表示一組 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> implements the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> 會實作 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> 介面。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.#ctor" /> 建構函式會建立 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> class that represents the specified CMS/PKCS #7 recipient.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> 類別的執行個體，表示指定的 CMS/PKCS #7 收件者。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> class and adds the specified recipient.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient)" /> 建構函式會建立 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> 類別的執行個體，並加入指定的收件者。

trans-unit.source: A member of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType" /> enumeration that specifies the type of subject identifier.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType" /> 列舉型別的成員，指定主旨識別項的型別。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> collection that contains the certificates that identify the recipients.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> 集合，包含識別收件者的憑證。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType,System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> class and adds recipients based on the specified subject identifier and set of certificates that identify the recipients.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType,System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection)" /> 建構函式會建立 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> 類別的執行個體，並根據指定的主旨識別項和識別收件者的憑證組來加入收件者。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> object that represents the recipient to add to the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> 物件，表示要加入至 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> 集合的收件者。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.Add(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient)" /> method adds a recipient to the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.Add(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient)" /> 方法會將收件者加入至 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: If the method succeeds, the method returns an <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that represents the zero-based position where the recipient is to be inserted.
trans-unit.target: 如果方法成功，方法會傳回 <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 值，表示要插入收件者之以零起始的位置。

trans-unit.source: If the method fails, it throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果方法失敗，就會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="recipient" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="recipient" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Copies the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection to an array.
trans-unit.target: 複製 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> 集合至陣列。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Array" /> object to which the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection is to be copied.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 物件，<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> 集合會複製到該物件。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in <c>array</c> where the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection is copied.
trans-unit.target: <c>array</c> 中以零起始的索引，<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> 集合將複製到該處。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)" /> method copies the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection to an array.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)" /> 方法可複製 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> 集合至陣列。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is not large enough to hold the specified elements.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 不夠大，無法包含指定的元素。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="array" /> does not contain the proper number of dimensions.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 不包含適當的維度數目。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is outside the range of elements in <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 在 <paramref name="array" /> 的元素範圍之外。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> objects where the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection is to be copied.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> 物件的陣列中，<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> 集合會複製到該陣列。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index for the array of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> objects in <c>array</c> to which the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection is copied.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> 集合會複製到 <c>array</c> 中之 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> 物件陣列以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.CopyTo(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient[],System.Int32)" /> method copies the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection to a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> array.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.CopyTo(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient[],System.Int32)" /> 方法可複製 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> 集合至 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> 陣列。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is not large enough to hold the specified elements.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 不夠大，無法包含指定的元素。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="array" /> does not contain the proper number of dimensions.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 不包含適當的維度數目。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is outside the range of elements in <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 在 <paramref name="array" /> 的元素範圍之外。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.Count" /> property retrieves the number of items in the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.Count" /> 屬性擷取 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> 集合中的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that represents the number of items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 值，表示集合中的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.GetEnumerator" /> method returns a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator" /> object for the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.GetEnumerator" /> 方法傳回 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator" /> 集合的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator" /> object that can be used to enumerate the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator" /> 物件，可用於列舉 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.IsSynchronized" /> property retrieves whether access to the collection is synchronized, or thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 不論是以同步方式或是以執行緒安全方式來存取集合，<see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.IsSynchronized" /> 屬性都會進行擷取。

trans-unit.source: This property always returns <see langword="false" />, which means that the collection is not thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性一律傳回 <see langword="false" />，表示此集合並不具備執行緒安全。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value of <see langword="false" />, which means that the collection is not thread safe.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，表示集合不具備執行緒安全。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that represents the index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 值，表示集合中的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index is zero based.
trans-unit.target: 索引以零起始。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.Item(System.Int32)" /> property retrieves the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> object at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.Item(System.Int32)" /> 屬性會擷取位於集合中指定索引的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 在指定索引處的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The value of an argument was outside the allowable range of values as defined by the called method.
trans-unit.target: 引數值超出呼叫方法所定義值的容許範圍。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> object that represents the recipient to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> 物件，表示要從集合移除的收件者。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.Remove(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient)" /> method removes a recipient from the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.Remove(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient)" /> 方法會從 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> 集合移除收件者。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="recipient" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="recipient" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.SyncRoot" /> property retrieves an <see cref="T:System.Object" /> object used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.SyncRoot" /> 屬性會擷取 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 物件，其用來同步存取 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> object that is used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 物件，用來同步存取 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.System#Collections#IEnumerable#GetEnumerator" /> method returns a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator" /> object for the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.System#Collections#IEnumerable#GetEnumerator" /> 方法傳回 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator" /> 集合的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator" /> object that can be used to enumerate the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator" /> 物件，可用於列舉 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> 集合。
